Group hierarchy: AWS Pricing Calculator provides only an estimate of your AWS fees and doesn't include any taxes that might apply. Your actual fees depend on a variety of factors, including your actual usage of AWS services.

Due to the limited budget, I decided to cut the costs regarding reliability and performance on mainly on the database side. I downscaled the instances and made them single AZ, getting them cheap but upping the RTO and RPO in case of an failure. Besides that I did some further cost optimization by switching to reserved instances and introducing intelligent tearing.
